page.title: 04FORDHOUSES METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: The old part of Fordhouses Methodist Church was opened 6th July 1940 by Mr.Ernist Bishop.They have a service on a Sunday at 11.00am and one at 6.30pm and a communion service once a month in the evening.Fordhouses Church have four ministers they had a woman minister in 1974. CHURCH ACTIVITIES. Sunday:Worship 11.00am & 6.30pm. Monday:Brownies 6.00-7.15pm. Tuesday:Playgroup 9.15-11.45am. Womans Own 2.30pm. House Group 7.45pm. Wednesday:Play Group 9.15-11.45pm. Handicapped club 7.45pm. Alternate. Thursday:Playgroup 9.15-11.45am. Guides 7.00pm. Friday:Social Club 8.00pm.
